trans-unit.source: Represents a designer verb that creates a template editing frame, and that can be invoked only by a template editor.
trans-unit.target: 表示會建立樣板 (Template) 編輯框架的設計工具動詞命令，且只可由樣板編輯器叫用 (Invoke)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb> class is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb>類別已經過時。

trans-unit.source: Expose templates through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property of a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 公開透過範本<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>控制項設計工具的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The design host creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedEditableDesignerRegion> for each <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> defined for a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 設計主應用程式建立<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedEditableDesignerRegion>每個<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>針對控制項設計工具定義。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The text to show for the verb on a menu.
trans-unit.target: 動作要在功能表上顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: An optional integer value that can be used by a designer, typically to indicate the index of the verb within a set of verbs.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具可以使用的選擇性整數值，通常用於表示動詞命令集合內的動詞命令索引。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb" /> class with the specified verb text and index.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的動詞命令文字和索引，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb> class is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb>類別已經過時。

trans-unit.source: Expose templates through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property of a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 公開透過範本<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>控制項設計工具的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The design host creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedEditableDesignerRegion> for each <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> defined for a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 設計主應用程式建立<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedEditableDesignerRegion>每個<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>針對控制項設計工具定義。

trans-unit.source: The text to show for the verb on a menu.
trans-unit.target: 動作要在功能表上顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: An optional integer value that can be used by a designer, typically to indicate the index of the verb within a set of verbs.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具可以使用的選擇性整數值，通常用於表示動詞命令集合內的動詞命令索引。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner" /> that can use this verb.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner" />，可以使用這個動作。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb> class is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb>類別已經過時。

trans-unit.source: Expose templates through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property of a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 公開透過範本<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>控制項設計工具的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The design host creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedEditableDesignerRegion> for each <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> defined for a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 設計主應用程式建立<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedEditableDesignerRegion>每個<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>針對控制項設計工具定義。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb" />.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb" /> 所使用的所有資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb" />.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb" /> 所使用的所有資源。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb.Dispose%2A> allows the resources used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb> to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb.Dispose%2A>允許所使用的資源<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb>都重新配置用於其他用途。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb> class is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb>類別已經過時。

trans-unit.source: Expose templates through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property of a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 公開透過範本<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>控制項設計工具的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The design host creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedEditableDesignerRegion> for each <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> defined for a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 設計主應用程式建立<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedEditableDesignerRegion>每個<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>針對控制項設計工具定義。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with `disposing` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`設`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。

trans-unit.source: When `disposing` is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`是`true`，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb>參考。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb" /> class is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb" />類別已經過時。

trans-unit.source: Expose templates through the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups" /> property of a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 公開透過範本<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups" />控制項設計工具的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The design host creates a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedEditableDesignerRegion" /> for each <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup" /> defined for a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 設計主應用程式建立<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedEditableDesignerRegion" />每個<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup" />針對控制項設計工具定義。

trans-unit.source: </para> </block> <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: </para> </block> <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫 <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 <see langword="Dispose" /> 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何實作<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to free resources before the object is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 在記憶體回收收回物件前，嘗試釋放資源。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and cleans up resources by calling `Dispose(false)`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會覆寫<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>並清除資源，藉由呼叫`Dispose(false)`。

trans-unit.source: Override `Dispose(Boolean)` to customize the cleanup.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫 `Dispose(Boolean)` 以自訂清除。

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式程式碼不應該呼叫這個方法。物件的`Finalize`方法會自動叫用記憶體回收期間，除非已停用記憶體回收行程的最終處理的呼叫所<xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Finalize 方法和解構函式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70)，[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb> class is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb>類別已經過時。

trans-unit.source: Expose templates through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property of a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 公開透過範本<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>控制項設計工具的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The design host creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedEditableDesignerRegion> for each <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> defined for a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 設計主應用程式建立<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedEditableDesignerRegion>每個<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>針對控制項設計工具定義。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index or other user data for the verb.
trans-unit.target: 取得動詞命令的索引或其他使用者資料。

trans-unit.source: The index or user data for the verb.
trans-unit.target: 動詞命令的索引或使用者資料。

trans-unit.source: This property is sometimes used to store the index of each verb in a set of verbs.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性，有時候會儲存每一個指令動詞索引的指令動詞的集合中。

trans-unit.source: When implementing a custom designer, this property can be used to store custom-defined integer data.
trans-unit.target: 在實作自訂的設計工具時，這個屬性可用來儲存自訂的整數資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb> class is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb>類別已經過時。

trans-unit.source: Expose templates through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property of a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 公開透過範本<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>控制項設計工具的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The design host creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedEditableDesignerRegion> for each <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> defined for a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 設計主應用程式建立<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedEditableDesignerRegion>每個<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>針對控制項設計工具定義。
